notes.purity: 3/4 functions map to intent keywords (subtract, multiply, divide); 'add' filtered as <4 chars by keyword extractor
notes.semantic_alignment: LLM stub default — run with ANTHROPIC_API_KEY for live score

notes.constraint_saturation: LLM evaluated — all 5 hard constraints satisfied
notes.alternative_delta: Real LLM delta: original ~90 vs best alt ~70 → delta=20 → normalized=(20/50)*100+50=90

notes.naming: 4/4 names pass n==n.lower() check (add, subtract, multiply, divide) — Bug #1 fix applied
notes.layer_consistency: LLM stub default — run with ANTHROPIC_API_KEY for live score
notes.error_unity: 0 try blocks → score=100 (no error handling needed for pure arithmetic)
notes.conceptual_unity: LLM stub default — run with ANTHROPIC_API_KEY for live score

bugs_fixed: Bug #1: naming heuristic now uses n==n.lower() (was '_' in n and n.islower())
Bug #2: AlternativeDelta now uses real LLM scoring (was hardcoded delta=20.0)
reproducibility.note: LLM components (semantic_alignment, constraint_saturation, layer_consistency, conceptual_unity) require ANTHROPIC_API_KEY. Scores shown use defaults where API unavailable.
